statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_management ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, stock_level FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, demand_pattern FROM inventory_management WHERE demand_pattern = 'High';
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, demand_pattern FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, demand_pattern, stock_level FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level > 75 AND demand_pattern = 'High' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE demand_pattern IN ('Low', 'Medium') ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock < 50;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, demand_pattern FROM inventory_management WHERE demand_pattern LIKE '%high%';
SELECT product_name, current_stock, adjustment_quantity, adjustment_date FROM inventory_management INNER JOIN stock_adjustments ON inventory_management.product_id = stock_adjustments.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_management WHERE current_stock > 50;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, demand_pattern FROM inventory_management WHERE product_id = 1001;
SELECT adjustment_id, adjustment_date, reason FROM stock_adjustments ORDER BY adjustment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_adjustments WHERE adjustment_quantity < 0;
SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT ProductName, StockLevel FROM Inventory WHERE StockLevel > 50
SELECT ProductName, DemandPatterns FROM Inventory WHERE ProductID = 1001
SELECT SaleDate, Quantity FROM Sales ORDER BY SaleDate DESC
SELECT * FROM StockAdjustments WHERE AdjustmentType = 'Restock'
SELECT ProductName, StockLevel FROM Inventory WHERE StockLevel > 100 ORDER BY StockLevel DESC;
SELECT ProductName, StockLevel, JSON_VALUE(DemandPatterns, '$.high_demand') AS HighDemand FROM Inventory WHERE JSON_VALUE(DemandPatterns, '$.high_demand') = 'true';
SELECT i.ProductName, s.Quantity, s.SaleDate FROM Sales s INNER JOIN Inventory i ON s.ProductID = i.ProductID WHERE s.Quantity > 10 order by s.SaleDate;

SELECT a.AdjustmentID, i.ProductName, a.AdjustmentType, a.AdjustmentQuantity, a.AdjustmentDate FROM StockAdjustments a INNER JOIN Inventory i ON a.ProductID = i.ProductID WHERE a.AdjustmentQuantity < 0 ORDER BY a.AdjustmentDate DESC;

SELECT i.ProductName, SUM(s.Quantity) AS TotalQuantitySold FROM Sales s INNER JOIN Inventory i ON s.ProductID = i.ProductID GROUP BY i.ProductName HAVING SUM(s.Quantity) > 50 ORDER BY TotalQuantitySold DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, s.sale_date, s.sale_amount FROM sales s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.id;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, d.demand_date, d.demand_level FROM demand_patterns d JOIN products p ON d.product_id = p.id ORDER BY d.demand_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, price, stock_level FROM products WHERE price > '50' ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT name, category, AVG(price), SUM(stock_level) FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT products.name, sales.sale_date, sales.sale_amount FROM products JOIN sales ON products.id = sales.product_id;

SELECT products.name, stock_adjustments.adjustment_date, stock_adjustments.adjustment_amount FROM products JOIN stock_adjustments ON products.id = stock_adjustments.product_id WHERE stock_adjustments.adjustment_amount < 0 ORDER BY stock_adjustments.adjustment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level > 50
SELECT item_id, item_name, stock_level FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, item_category, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM inventory_items GROUP BY item_category
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_category FROM inventory_items WHERE item_category IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE stock_level > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM inventory_items WHERE item_category IS NOT NULL AND stock_level < 50
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM sales_orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT si.order_id, si.item_id, si.quantity, si.unit_price, ii.item_name FROM sales_items si JOIN inventory_items ii ON si.item_id = ii.item_id

SELECT sh.date, sh.item_id, sh.stock_level, dh.forecasted_demand FROM stock_history sh JOIN demand_forecast df ON sh.item_id = df.item_id AND sh.date = df.date WHERE sh.stock_level < df.forecasted_demand
